text: Fans of The Walking Dead had to say farewell to yet another of their favorite characters Sunday night. In a year in which we â€™ ve lost Carl ( Chandler Riggs ), Rick ( Andrew Lincoln ) and possibly Maggie ( Lauren Cohan ), Jesus ( Tom Payne ) breathed his last. In typical heroic fashion, he died trying to get others to safety. While on a mission to rescue Eugene ( Josh McDermott ) with Daryl ( Norman Reedus ) and Aaron ( Ross Marquand ), the group found themselves in a graveyard with a new foe approaching. After fighting off a few walkers with ninja - like skill, Jesus took one last swing of the sword only to have the would - be walker duck, then stab him in the back.
